basics.name: Jim Park
basics.label: Systems Engineer
basics.summary: I have DevOps on Vinyl. I have a passion for creating flow, creativity, and fun in all domains of life. In technology, that means I build tools that are simple to use, but as a collection do complicated work. In people, that means I bring confidence, empathy, and the occassional dad joke.

work.position: Member of the Technical Staff - Head of Operations
work.summary: Responsible for Credit Suisse Labs cloud and security operations
Technical leader in Pivotal Web Services Cloud Operations team
Responsible for linux and OmniOS production servers.
Responsible for 1000+ physical linux and Windows production servers.
highlights: 1000+ servers running puppet for the first time is scary, but I did it.

work.summary: Responsible for server and network infrastructure in support of many customer sites with persistent VPN tunnels.
First responder for customer server incidents.
highlights: Recovered a hard drive with no partition table.

work.summary: Systems Administrator with a heart of gold images.
highlights: Cut lab deployment time in half.

work.position: Sergeant - Ground Electronics Telecommunications and Information Technology Systems Maintainer
highlights: In OIF, reduced MTTR for field hardware from months to same day or next day for a majority of common repairs by modifying shop procedures and implementing a parts cache.

volunteer.summary: Social Mobility Pathways matches mentors with junior professionals and students. Mentors receive leadership training, and mentees are given guidance and structures for fulfilling on their life's purpose.
Toastmasters International is a nonprofit educational organization that operates clubs for the purpose of promoting communication, public speaking, and leadership skills.
